nodes.text: Jaig Eyes, short for jai'galaara'la sur'haii'se (Mando'a for "shriek-hawk eyes"), were a combat honor. They adorned the helmet of the Clone Captain CT-7567, nicknamed "Rex," stealth operations clone trooper commander "Blackout," and Jedi Knight Kanan Jarrus, who wore them after he lost his sight in his battle against Maul on Malachor.
